rayburn.engine.dew.lang

Class DewInterpreter.DewParser.ParseTokens.VariablePointer

  • java.lang.Object
    • rayburn.engine.dew.lang.DewInterpreter.Token
      • rayburn.engine.dew.lang.DewInterpreter.DewParser.ParseTokens.ParseToken
        • rayburn.engine.dew.lang.DewInterpreter.DewParser.ParseTokens.VariablePointer
  • Enclosing class:
    DewInterpreter.DewParser.ParseTokens

    public static class DewInterpreter.DewParser.ParseTokens.VariablePointer
extends DewInterpreter.DewParser.ParseTokens.ParseToken
    This class hold a reference (pointer) to a variable. It created in the parse stage to replace String literals representing variable name to save on runtime memory and allow users to implement basic inter-variable pointer arithmetic.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private short pointer
      The pointer to the variable (value) an instance of this class represents.

      Gets the variable this pointer points to so its value can be retrieved.

      Gets the variable this pointer points to so its value can be retrieved.
      void setPointer(short pointer)
      Sets a new pointer, used when pointer arithmetic repoints an instance of this class to a new variable (value).

      • getVariable

        public DewInterpreter.DewParser.ParseTokens.Variable getVariable(java.util.ArrayList<DewInterpreter.DewParser.ParseTokens.Variable> variables)
                                                          throws DewInterpreter.DewException
        Gets the variable this pointer points to so its value can be retrieved.
        Parameters:
        variables - the local variable list
        Returns:
        the variable pointed to by an instance of this class
        Throws:
        DewInterpreter.DewException - throws an exception if no variable is found for the internal pointer. The reference should be secure at the time of initialization.

      • getVariable

        public DewInterpreter.DewParser.ParseTokens.Variable getVariable(java.util.ArrayList<DewInterpreter.DewParser.ParseTokens.Variable> localVariables,

                                                          throws DewInterpreter.DewException
        Gets the variable this pointer points to so its value can be retrieved.
        Parameters:
        localVariables - the local variable list
        globalVariables - the global variable list
        Returns:
        the variable pointed to by an instance of this class
        Throws:
        DewInterpreter.DewException - throws an exception if no variable is found for the internal pointer. The reference should be secure at the time of initialization.
